file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
security:
  - jwtBearer: []
info:
  title: Schul-Cloud Link Service API
  description:
    This is the API specification for the Schul-Cloud Link service.
    
  contact:
    name: support
    email: info@dbildungscloud.de
  license:
    name: GPL-3.0
    url: 'https://github.com/hpi-schul-cloud/schulcloud-server/blob/master/LICENSE'
  version: 1.0.0
components:
  securitySchemes:
    jwtBearer:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
      bearerFormat: JWT
  schemas:
    link:
      description: TODO
    link_list:
      description: TODO
    registrationlink:
      description: TODO
    expertinvitelink:
      description: TODO

paths:
  /link:
    get:
      parameters:
        - description: Number of results to return
          in: query
          name: $limit
          schema:
            type: integer
        - description: Number of results to skip
          in: query
          name: $skip
          schema:
            type: integer
        - description: Property to sort results
          in: query
          name: $sort
          style: deepObject
          schema:
            type: object
        - description: Query parameters to filter
          in: query
          name: filter
          style: form
          explode: true
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/link'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/link_list'
        '401':
          description: not authenticated
        '500':
          description: general error
      description: Retrieves a list of all resources from the service.
      summary: ''
      tags:
        - link
      security: []
    post:
      parameters: []
      responses:
        '201':
          description: created
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/link'
        '401':
          description: not authenticated
        '500':
          description: general error
      description: Creates a new resource with data.
      summary: ''
      tags:
        - link
      security: []
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/link'
  '/link/{_id}':
    get:
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: _id
          description: ID of link to return
          schema:
            type: integer
          required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/link'
        '401':
          description: not authenticated
        '404':
          description: not found
        '500':
          description: general error
      description: Retrieves a single resource with the given id from the service.
      summary: ''
      tags:
        - link
      security: []
    put:
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: _id
          description: ID of link to update
          schema:
            type: integer
          required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/link'
        '401':
          description: not authenticated
        '404':
          description: not found
        '500':
          description: general error
      description: Updates the resource identified by id using data.
      summary: ''
      tags:
        - link
      security: []
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/link'
    patch:
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: _id
          description: ID of link to update
          schema:
            type: integer
          required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/link'
        '401':
          description: not authenticated
        '404':
          description: not found
        '500':
          description: general error
      description: Updates the resource identified by id using data.
      summary: ''
      tags:
        - link
      security: []
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/link'
    delete:
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: _id
          description: ID of link to remove
          schema:
            type: integer
          required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/link'
        '401':
          description: not authenticated
        '404':
          description: not found
        '500':
          description: general error
      description: Removes the resource with id.
      summary: ''
      tags:
        - link
      security: []
  /registrationlink:
    post:
      parameters: []
      responses:
        '201':
          description: created
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/registrationlink'
        '401':
          description: not authenticated
        '500':
          description: general error
      description: Creates a new resource with data.
      summary: ''
      tags:
        - registrationlink
      security: []
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/registrationlink'
  /expertinvitelink:
    post:
      parameters: []
      responses:
        '201':
          description: created
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/expertinvitelink'
        '401':
          description: not authenticated
        '500':
          description: general error
      description: Creates a new resource with data.
      summary: ''
      tags:
        - expertinvitelink
      security: []
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/expertinvitelink'
  
openapi: 3.0.2
tags:
  - name: link
    description: A link service.
  - name: registrationlink
    description: A registrationlink service.
  - name: expertinvitelink
    description: An expertinvitelink service.

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: path "/link": at 1:1110: get: at 1:1117: parameters: parse parameter "filter": at 1:1522: invalid schema:style:explode combination: ("":"form":true)
